text: @WHO @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @WHOSEARO @WHOWPRO @pahowho Wait, indoors or outdoors? You can't seriously be recommended exercise indoor, in a gym, no masks, only one meter distance? You are being cited by gyms to prove that this is ok. But I would think it not ok. Can you clarify?
